comments:
History of what happened: I opened a .project file in Windows Notepad. Windows
assigned Notepad as the default program with which to open .project files. After
this my eclipse platform did not want to open my java-projects. I managed to
"unassign" the .project files, but the problem remained (eclipse didn't want to
open the projects due to a problem with the .project files - this happened for
all my projects). I then deleted the eclipse platform from my system and
re-installing it, thinking that this might solve the problem. However, after
re-installation I encountered a fatal error as listed below in the log-file.
PLEASE HELP ME!!!
